import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from '../auth.service'; import { HotToastService } from '@ngneat/hot-toast'; @Component({ selector: 'app-donor-login', templateUrl: './donor-login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./donor-login.component.css'] }) export class DonorLoginComponent { loginForm: any; constructor( private authService: AuthService, toast: HotToastService ) { } onSubmit(item: NgForm) { if(item.invalid) { } this.authService.donorLogin(item.value); } }
